## TOnPlotAttached type

Listener for plot attach to chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TOnPlotAttached<TEntityRenderer extends TUnknownEntityRenderer> = TListener<"onPlotAttached", [IChartComponent<TEntityRenderer>]>;
```
